name: Gravity man's adventure 2: Escape of aliens DEMO
name_original: Gravity man's adventure 2: Escape of aliens DEMO
description:
The aliens came and destroyed our earth! Find the doctor to get the potion what kills all aliens on this planet!

I made the game all by myself and it's my first game/Demo made in godot.

This game also has a Controller-Input so you can play with a controller!

Please give me feedback in the comments (pros, contras, bugs, additions etc.)

Sound and more levels will be added in the full version of the game so follow me on itch.io to not miss a game!

I hope you enjoyed the Demo!

Credits: Programmer - Daniel

                   Designer - Daniel

                    Animator - Daniel
